item.title: 最新消息：佛罗里达州杰克逊维尔海滩发生枪击事件，一人死亡，两人伤势稳定。

item.title: 美国联邦调查局（FBI）称，在马萨诸塞州的一个家庭从已故父亲的私人物品中发现了 22 件在二战冲绳战役后被掠夺的历史文物后，这些文物已被归还日本。
item.description:
Twenty-two historic artifacts that were looted following the Battle of Okinawa in World War II have been returned to Japan after a family from Massachusetts discovered them in their late father’s personal items, the FBI said. https://t.co/E1y7VY5Vc6

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 艾伦研究所的研究人员正在开展 "登月 "项目，比如绘制人脑地图，希望借此了解人体器官，帮助防治脑部疾病。
item.description:
Researchers at the Allen Institute are pursing "moonshot" projects, like mapping the human brain, in hopes of understanding the organ and to help fight brain diseases. https://t.co/OfpWgcrzUF

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: "很多人都说，'那天你是个英雄'。那天我只是想保护一个小男孩。"在密尔沃基一条繁忙的街道上，一名公交车司机救助了一名独自徘徊的小男孩，在警察将他与家人团聚之前，将他带到车上取暖。
item.description:
"A lot of people saying, ‘You were a hero that day.’ I just looked to protect a little boy that day."

A bus driver came to the rescue of a young boy wandering alone on a busy Milwaukee street, bringing him on board to keep him warm before police reunited him with his family. pic.twitter.com/tv8e5MmzaL

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 当局表示，周日在一起涉及执法人员的枪击案中，杀害一名新墨西哥州州警和一名南卡罗来纳州护理人员的嫌犯被抓获。

item.title: 一项新的小型研究表明，与狗玩耍可以减轻压力、刺激大脑活动并有助于集中注意力。

item.title: 众议员罗-卡纳（Ro Khanna）告诉 @玛莎-拉达茨，众议院通过的 TikTok 法案实际上并不能保护美国人，相反，他正在推动其他立法，以更好地防止外国对手获取私人信息。
item.description:
Rep. Ro Khanna tells @MarthaRaddatz that the TikTok bill the House passed wouldn't actually protect Americans, instead pushing for other legislation that he says would better prevent foreign adversaries from obtaining private information. https://t.co/rMOkppRW39 pic.twitter.com/XVsEBYunDc

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.title: "Taylor Swift | The Eras Tour (Taylor's Version) "已正式登陆 Disney+。这部斯威夫特大热演唱会电影的流媒体版本包含四首原声歌曲，这四首歌在之前的剧场版和点播版中都没有出现过。
item.description:
"Taylor Swift | The Eras Tour (Taylor's Version)" has officially arrived on Disney+.

The streaming version of Swift's mega-hit concert film contains four acoustic songs not previously featured in either the theatrical or VOD versions. https://t.co/5IFc5pMf9a

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.description:
Police announced on social media Sunday that missing University of Missouri student Riley Strain's bank card was discovered on an embankment near the Cumberland River in Nashville, adding, "The search for him continues." https://t.co/v80qwE5HBR pic.twitter.com/mIvUL4grM8

item.title: 研究发现，水下扬声器播放来自健康珊瑚礁的声音（如鱼叫声）有助于恢复退化的珊瑚礁。
item.description:

item.title: 欧盟宣布向资金短缺的埃及提供 80 亿美元的一揽子援助，因为人们越来越担心，经济压力和邻国的冲突可能导致更多移民涌向欧洲海岸。

item.title: 俄亥俄州州长宣布上周遭受恶劣天气袭击的 11 个县进入紧急状态。州长迈克-德怀恩（Mike DeWine）还启动了俄亥俄州国民警卫队，以帮助一个县（洛根县）的官员，该县已确认有三人死亡。
item.description:
Ohio’s governor has declared a state of emergency in 11 counties struck by severe weather last week.

Gov. Mike DeWine also activated the Ohio National Guard to help officials in one county, Logan County, where three deaths were confirmed. https://t.co/7n4hKXHqvf

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.title: 一名建筑工人在挖掘停车场时，发现了一座拥有 1800 年历史的神秘罗马雕像。

item.title: 塔吉特正在将自助结账的物品数量限制在 10 件以内--该公司称此举将提高效率，改善顾客体验。这与其他零售商逐步取消自助结账的做法如出一辙。
item.description:
Is self-checkout checking out?

Target is limiting self-checkout to 10 items or less — a move the company says will improve efficiency and customer experience. This comes as other retailers are phasing out self-checkout altogether. https://t.co/LPUDPyYLsL pic.twitter.com/VA4yhNmTov

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.title: 将标准工作周从 40 小时减少到 32 小时的提案本周取得了突破性进展，在参议院站稳了脚跟，该提案要求企业提供 32 小时工作周，但保留员工工资：
item.description:
A push to slash the standard workweek from 40 hours to 32 achieved a breakthrough this week, gaining a foothold in the Senate with a proposal that would require businesses to offer the 32-hour workweek but preserve employee pay.

Read more: https://t.co/MX7l7UPwBz pic.twitter.com/AF91RPYTT9

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.title: 史蒂夫-哈雷（Steve Harley）是一位英国音乐家，他的华丽摇滚乐队 Cockney Rebel 曾以一首《Make Me Smile (Come Up and See Me)》经久不衰。享年 73 岁。
item.description:
Steve Harley, a British musician whose glam-rock band Cockney Rebel had an enduring hit with the song “Make Me Smile (Come Up and See Me),” has died. He was 73. https://t.co/0fr4PRiCDB

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.title: 莉莉是奥克兰动物园救助的一只幼虎，有人看到它好奇地观看一部关于老虎的纪录片。动物园说它在 "了解自己的同类"。
item.description:
Lily, a tiger cub rescued by Oakland Zoo, was seen curiously watching a documentary about tigers. The zoo said she was “learning about her own kind.” https://t.co/DVe2gH7cpq pic.twitter.com/YQzHLxwsK1

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.title: 碧昂斯（Beyoncé）即将发行的新专辑正式命名为 "Cowboy Carter"。这位歌手本周早些时候通过她的网站透露了她将于 3 月 29 日推出的乡村音乐新专辑的名字：
item.description:
Beyoncé's upcoming album officially has a name, and it's "Cowboy Carter." The singer revealed the name of her new country album, which arrives March 29, via her website earlier this week.

Read more: https://t.co/uEKxhTtkFA pic.twitter.com/lzvUJfwHbg

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024
